overview:
CEO of MarketPlane and Groofer.com

Ronnie is a marketer and entrepreneur with expertise in all aspects of B2B marketing. Ronnie’s firm - MarketPlane works with technology companies from soup to nuts marketing strategy and execution. In this model MarketPlane frequently operates as an outsourced marketing arm for startups or mid sized companies with full accountability for results.

MarketPlane also funds innovative business social software projects. The first offering Groofer - helps business professionals tackle their information overload.
